featured.text: Dried fish heads and spines are exported to West Africa, where they are used as the base of a protein-rich soup.
Due to the global financial crisis, the country’s exports _____ by 40 percent last month, the largest drop since 2000.
They were designed in this way for export to the US.

definition.zh_def: 將商品或服務銷售到國外的行為。
definition.en_def: The act of selling goods or services to a foreign country.
definition.example: The company plans to export its products to Europe next year.
